work.company: Foody Corp, Floor 8, 244 Cong Quynh, Pham Ngu Lao Ward, District 11, HCM City
work.desc: Develop location-based application for discovering restaurants/cafes, browsing their good reviews & comments, promotions, booking

- Collect and analyze product requirement, communicate and clarify requirement with product team.
- Tasks breakdown and estimate for delivery
- Implement core architecture, key classes
- Team support and development member
- Implementation & Code review
Develop a cluster database based on Postgres open source database system, consist of cluster of workstations connected by infiniband high-speed network.
Research and develop driver for a rt2570 chipset usb network card that support merging mesh network - IEEE 802.11s draft network standard.
